headline: AZ lawmakers introduce bills to raise school spending cap
author: Brooke Long
sentences: School officials have said the way to avoid those budget shortfalls is action by the legislature to raise the aggregate expenditure limit to allow districts to spend the money they already had budgeted.
TUCSON, Ariz. — Lawmakers in Arizona's Senate and House of Representatives have introduced bills that would raise the current spending cap for public schools.
